title: How to Make Welsh Rarebit

steps.headline: Mix milk and cheese.
steps.description: Put milk and cheese in top of double boiler over hot water.

steps.headline: Mix the other ingredients.
steps.description: Mix until the preparation is homogeneous.

steps.headline: Cook for five minutes.
steps.description: Stir constantly and serve at once on toast.

text: Mix milk and cheese. Put milk and cheese in top of double boiler over hot water. Heat until cheese is melted. The cheese must be smooth. Mix the other ingredients. Mix until the preparation is homogeneous. Add to cheese and milk. Mix well to avoid lumps. Cook for five minutes. Stir constantly and serve at once on toast.
